items.summary: Refine the Style B ("home-style-b") color tone so the unauthenticated homepage (PublicOverviewPage + MarketingBanner) has a more cohesive, balanced palette across light and dark modes. Update the CSS variable overrides for Style B in `frontend/src/index.css` (e.g., background/card/accent/border/ring) and, if needed, adjust Style B-only gradient/opacity choices in `frontend/src/components/marketing/MarketingBanner.tsx` so the banner and page surfaces look consistent and readable.
